def_cn: 金牛宫，金牛座(黄道十二宫之一。出生于 4 月 20 日与 5 月 20 日之间的人属此星座)
def_en: Taurus is one of the twelve signs of the zodiac. Its symbol is a bull. People who are born approximately between the 20th of April and the 20th of May come under this sign.

def_cn: 出生于金牛宫时段的人
def_en: A Taurus is a person whose sign of the zodiac is Taurus.
